FuncDef: The display mac-address-usage command displays the usage of a MAC address table.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the usage of a MAC address table on a specified board.
If no slot is specified, the usage of MAC address tables on all boards is displayed.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The capacity of a MAC table is limited. You can run the display mac-address-usage command to view the usage of a MAC address table.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
